Text: The 9/11 Truth Movement is bigger than ever now. The description of this movie fails to recognize that there are now thousands of professional architects, engineers, pilots, scientists, scholars, medical professionals, veterans, military officers, firefighters and hundreds of other organizations and millions of Americans speaking out for the 9/11 truth movement and calling for a new investigation because the so-called investigations orchestrated by the US government have all been shams that contradict themselves with their Saturday morning cartoon physics and outright lies that have additionally been forced upon the people by single-minded, war-profiteering mainstream news media. Time for America to wake up and demand the truth!
